email_text:
Subject: Your Verizon Monthly Bill Notification

Dear [Customer's Name],

Thank you for being a valued Verizon customer. We would like to inform you that your monthly bill for the period of [Billing Cycle Dates] is now available for your review.

Summary of Charges:
- Monthly plan: $XX.XX
- Device payment: $XX.XX
- Taxes and fees: $XX.XX
Total Amount Due: $XXX.XX

To view and download a detailed breakdown of your bill, please click on the following link: [PDF Download Link]

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your bill, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team at [Verizon Customer Service Number].

Thank you for choosing Verizon.

Sincerely,
Verizon Customer Service Team
